name: Roulette Master!
description:
Roulette Master! app is an evolution of my Roulette Wiz! app.
Some advanced users requested some new systems, and Roulette Master! is here for that: to allow you building your own systems.
Roulette Master! has a powerful alarm manager that eases the visualization of active systems.

Roulette Master! is an application that assists you in targeting sleepers (looks for roulette bets that don’t appear for a long number of spins). The app allows defining a general alert threshold that is customized for each kind of bet. Every time that a particular threshold is exceeded, Roulette Master! alerts the user, indicating that is a good time to start betting. Bets that are available in this version are:
- Red-Black
- Even-Odd
- Low – High
- Dozens
- Columns
- Lines
- Streets
- Numbers
- Voisins du zero

This application is intended for use in online games. Its use in real casinos may not be authorized.
